channel.title: Anyone got a code for perfect spell emote gfx when u teleport like the whole cod

item.title: Anyone got a code for perfect spell emote gfx when u teleport like the whole cod
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

In your TeleTo method, add a new spell, such as;

You’d do this if you wanted a normal teleport spell (normal magics)

if (s == "NameHere") { teleportPlr(xcoord, ycoord, height, 1); }

and, you’d do this if you wanted an Ancient teleport

if (s == "NameHere") { teleportPlr(xcoord, ycoord, height, 2); }

Now, in your case, you would do;

case 4140: TeleTo("NameHere"); break;

Read full topic
item.source: Anyone got a code for perfect spell emote gfx when u teleport like the whole cod

sendMessage(“You can’t teleport that fast!”);
}
else if(teleblock == true){
sendMessage(“A magical force stops you from teleporting.”);
}
else
{
setAnimation(714);

teleportToX = 3214;
teleportToY = 3425;

ResetAttack();
gfx100(308);
txt4 = “Varrock!”;
string4UpdateRequired = true;
heightLevel = 0;
teleptimer = 40;

}
break;

ok i will have ago but thats the code i got atm

item.source: Anyone got a code for perfect spell emote gfx when u teleport like the whole cod

item.title: Anyone got a code for perfect spell emote gfx when u teleport like the whole cod
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Declare;

public int teletimer; public int teleX; public int teleY; public int newheightLevel; public boolean teleport; public boolean ancientstele;

[code] public void teleportPlr(int X, int Y, int height, int teleType) {
resetWalkingQueue();
teleX = X;
teleY = Y;
newheightLevel = height;
if (teleType == 1) {
setAnimation(714);
ancientstele = false;
teleport();
}
if (teleType == 2) {
lowGFX(395, 0);
setAnimation(1979);
ancientstele = true;
teleport();
}
ResetAttack();
ResetAttackNPC();
RemoveAllWindows();
actionTimer = 10;
}

public void Teleport(int X, int Y, int height) {
	teleportToX = X;
	teleportToY = Y;
	heightLevel = height;
	if (teleport) {
		teleX = 0;
		teleY = 0;
		newheightLevel = 0;
		teleport = false;
		frame1();
	}
    	updateRequired = true;
    	appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

public void teleport() {
	teleport = true;
	if (ancientstele)
	{
			teletimer = 5;
		} else if (!ancientstele) {
			teletimer = 4;
	}
}[/code]

public void TeleTo(String s) { if (teleblock == false && actionTimer <= 0 && playerLevel[3] >= 1) { if (s == "Ape") { teleportPlr(2538 + misc.random(3), 4715 + misc.random(2), 0, 1); } if (s == "Paddewwa") { teleportPlr(3084 + misc.random(4), 3493 + misc.random(4), 0, 2); } } else if (teleblock) { sendMsg("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); } }

[code] public void lowGFX(int id, int delay) {
mask100var1 = id;
mask100var2 = delay;
mask100update = true;
updateRequired = true;
}

public void gfxRich(int gfx) {
	mask100var1 = gfx;
	mask100var2 = 6553600;
	mask100update = true;
	updateRequired = true;
}[/code]

Now, in your process() method, add;

if (teletimer > 0) { teletimer -= 1; } if (teleport && teletimer == 2 && !ancientstele) { gfxRich(310); } if (teleport && teletimer < 1) { Teleport(teleX, teleY, newheightLevel); setInterfaceWalkable(-1); }

Now you’re done. Use as;

			TeleTo("NameThatYouMadeInTeleToMethodHere");

Read full topic
